Uses of Class
org.restlet.ext.oauth.OAuthParameters

  • Packages that use OAuthParameters 
    Package Description
    org.restlet.ext.oauth
    Support for OAuth 2.0 HTTP authentication.

    • Uses of OAuthParameters in org.restlet.ext.oauth

      Methods in org.restlet.ext.oauth that return OAuthParameters 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OAuthParameters OAuthParameters.add(String name, String value)
      Add a new parameter.
      OAuthParameters OAuthParameters.code(String code)
      Adds a OAuthResourceDefs.CODE parameter.
      protected OAuthParameters OAuthProxy.createAuthorizationRequest()
      Returns the set of Oauth parameters used to generate the URI of the Authorization request.
      protected OAuthParameters OAuthProxy.createTokenRequest(String code)
      Returns the set of Oauth parameters used to generate the URI of the token request.
      OAuthParameters OAuthParameters.grantType(GrantType grantType)
      Adds a OAuthResourceDefs.GRANT_TYPE parameter.
      OAuthParameters OAuthParameters.password(String password)
      Adds a OAuthResourceDefs.PASSWORD parameter.
      OAuthParameters OAuthParameters.redirectURI(String redirectURI)
      Adds a OAuthResourceDefs.REDIR_URI parameter.
      OAuthParameters OAuthParameters.refreshToken(String refreshToken)
      Adds a OAuthResourceDefs.REFRESH_TOKEN parameter.
      OAuthParameters OAuthParameters.responseType(ResponseType responseType)
      Adds a OAuthResourceDefs.RESPONSE_TYPE parameter.
      OAuthParameters OAuthParameters.scope(String[] scope)
      Adds a OAuthResourceDefs.SCOPE parameter.
      OAuthParameters OAuthParameters.state(String state)
      Adds a OAuthResourceDefs.STATE parameter.
      OAuthParameters OAuthParameters.username(String username)
      Adds a OAuthResourceDefs.USERNAME parameter.
      Methods in org.restlet.ext.oauth with parameters of type OAuthParameters 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.restlet.ext.oauth.internal.Token FacebookAccessTokenClientResource.requestToken(OAuthParameters parameters) 
      org.restlet.ext.oauth.internal.Token AccessTokenClientResource.requestToken(OAuthParameters parameters)
      Returns the OAuth token by requesting the remote authorization server.
      protected void AccessTokenClientResource.setupBodyClientCredentials(OAuthParameters parameters)
      By default adds the clientId and clientSecret (if any) values to the set of Oauth parameters.
      Called from AccessTokenClientResource.requestToken(OAuthParameters) method.
